text: 'alam taelam -ayha alrswl- 'amr 'uwlayik aldhyn yuthnwn ealaa 'anfusahum waemalhm, wysfwnha balthr walbed ean alsw'? bal allah taealaa wahdah hu aldhy yuthni ealaa man yasha' min ebadh, laealimah bhqyqt aemalhm, wala yunqaswn min 'aemalahum shyyana miqdar alkhayt aldhy yakun fi shiqun nawat altmrt
